articles.title: How India is trying to win the semiconductor race, fighting decades of challenges & setbacks - ThePrint
articles.description: India lagged in semiconductor revolution of the 1980s, while countries like China and Taiwan raced ahead. Some start-ups are doing cutting-edge work, but there’s a long way to go.
articles.content: New Delhi: The white bull pulled a cart along the busy Miller’s Road and stopped outside Sona Towers in Bangalore. A now classic black-and-white photo shows workers unloading its high-tech cargo: Ind… [+15680 chars]
